description.en: Scratch is a block-based visual programming language and online community targeted primarily at children. Users of the site can create online projects using a block-like interface. The service is developed by the MIT Media Lab, has been translated into 70+ languages, and is used in most parts of the world.
description.ga_IE: Is teanga clársceidealaithe blocbhunaithe é an scratch agus pobal ar líne atá dírithe go príomha ar leanaí.Is féidir le húsáideoirí an tsuímh tionscadail ar líne a chruthú ag baint úsáide as comhéadan bloc-mhaith.Is é an tseirbhís a fhorbairt ag an MIT MEDIA Lab, aistrithe go 70+ teanga, agus úsáidtear é i bhformhór na gcodanna den domhan.
